phrs.translation: 最疯狂, 发狂的, 疯狂
我爱你轰轰烈烈最疯狂

sentences.sentence: He drove like an idiot, passing in the craziest places.
sentences.translation: 他像白痴一样净把车往最不可思议的地方开。

sentences.sentence: Many people still cannot believe what he has done so far, so that is why they sometimes describe him as "Fishman", "Human Fish" or even "the Craziest Man in the World".
sentences.translation: 许多人仍然无法相信他迄今为止所做的一切，所以人们有时将他描述为“鱼人”、“人鱼”，甚至是“世界上最疯狂的人”。

sentences.sentence: In what's probably the craziest headline I've ever written, I've reported that advances in livestock protection are happening with scientists painting eyes on the butts of cows.
sentences.translation: 在我曾写过的可能最为疯狂的新闻报道中，我曾报道过科学家在牛屁股上画眼睛的实验，这是牲畜保护方面所取得的进步。
